name: Ratatoskr
description:
Ratatoskr is a squirrel who guards the World Tree of Yggdrasil.
In God of War (2018), he only appears as a foul-mouthed runic animal whom Atreus can summon to give Kratos stones. Atreus and Kratos meet the "real" Ratatoskr in God of War Ragnar√∂k, who explains the runic animal they know is simply one of his spectral counterparts.
